definition: tonic food (food considered to be particularly healthful)/to eat such foods
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
(TCM) to build up one's kidney yang/to boost male sex drive
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
